pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Queen’s Park and will be greeted by the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford.

Main entrance
Queen’s Park
111 Wellesley Street West

Notes for media: 

    • Photo opportunity of arrival
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m. through the West entrance
    • For media who are not members of the Queen’s Park Press Gallery, you must obtain accreditation in room 149 prior to 1:15 p.m.

2:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford.

Premier’s Office
Queen’s Park
111 Wellesley Street West

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting 
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m. through the West entrance
    • For media who are not members of the Queen’s Park Press Gallery, you must obtain accreditation in room 149 prior to 1:15 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Centre for Israel and Jewish Affairs.

Closed to media
